page.title: 05Area around Bristol airport
page.content: Bristol airport is on the A38,some of it extending into our area,but most of it lying just to the north. There are very few houses to the east and south of the airport because of aircraft noise.Most farms and some houses were built before the airport, but very few have been built since. There is some concern that the airport runway may be extended east across the A38,which would then have to be diverted underground.This would involve the loss of Felton common with its sports and recreation facilities. There would also be an increase in noise and road traffic from the increased number of flights.
